issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
From HDFS-5032:
bq. Absence of heartbeat during flush will be fixed in a separate jira by Daryn Sharp

This JIRA tracks the case where absence of heartbeat can cause the pipeline to fail if operations like flush take some time to complete.

comments.body: v1 patch with a test that checks if heartbeats get sent during DataStreamer#run call.
